  1. Case home

Plan decision due: 14 Dec 2025

An EHC needs assessment is in progress under Section 36 (1) of the Children and Families Act 2014. Please ensure that all relevant professional contributors have been requested to provide advice and the family have appropriate support in place to complete "About me" and "Parent/carer's views". A decision to issue an EHC Plan or not is due by 14 Dec 2025.
